Uses of Interface
com.j2speed.async.ExceptionHandler

Uses of ExceptionHandler in com.j2speed.async
 

Subinterfaces of ExceptionHandler in com.j2speed.async
 interface CompletionHandler
          An ExceptionHandler that also handles the notification of the completion of a computation.
 interface ProgressHandler<T>
          It handles the values received during the execution of an asynchronous Progressive.
 interface ResponseHandler<T>
          It handles the value received as a result of the execution of an asynchronous Request .
 

Classes in com.j2speed.async that implement ExceptionHandler
 class AsyncCompletion
          A compound class that provide both the definition of the computation and the handling of its completion.
 class AsyncProgress<T>
          A compound class that provide both the definition of the computation and the handling of its progress.
 class AsyncResponse<T>
          A compound class that provide both the definition of the computation and the handling of its response.
 class CompletionAdapter
          An empty implementation adapter for CompletionHandlers.
 class ExceptionAdapter
          An empty implementation adapter for ExceptionHandlers.
 class ProgressAdapter<T>
          An adapter for the interface.
 class ResponseAdapter<T>
          An adapter for the interface
